name: @pact-foundation/pact-provider-verifier
description: Pact provider verifier wrapper package. Installing this will install an executable appropriate for your platform.
author: Matt Fellows <m@onegeek.com.au> (http://www.onegeek.com.au)

scripts.link: npm link ./build/pact-provider-verifier-darwin/ && npm link ./build/pact-provider-verifier-win32/ && npm link ./build/pact-provider-verifier-linux-ia32/ && npm link ./build/pact-provider-verifier-linux-x64/
scripts.unlink: npm unlink ./build/pact-provider-verifier-darwin/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-provider-verifier-win32/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-provider-verifier-linux-ia32/ && npm unlink ./build/pact-provider-verifier-linux-x64/
